timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: As I see tests mentioning this I have to ask what it refers to?
timeline.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText: In this particular case it refers to the data object passed to the template. this always returns the last context object on the stack.
replies.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText:
If it's not documented, it should not be implemented. If it's implemented it should be documented.
ATM I don't see the value of having this be implemented and resolved, so I suggest we disable it.
replies.author: FroMage
